channel.title: {help please} hey i just made my server But........>.>
channel.description:
hey! i'm noobish at this whole server thing but i know enough to get around :). But i still need abit of help please :)? I have a server source and a Server I.P (xgodzx.no-ip.info) and all my ports are set. But i put server up run source and then i try to get ma friends on..then comes the BUT...lol.. How do i get them on the server? Because when everything includeing the server is online they still cant get online.. can som1 please help me?
Also. Please pm me at with_skillz_that_kill@hotmail.com if u can help..:) Thanx
Thanx azraz ;D

item.title: {help please} hey i just made my server But........>.>
item.dc:creator: @xXpsychoXx xXpsychoXx
item.description:
@xXpsychoXx wrote:

ok i used a TuT to forward my ports and get my virtual I.P… when you forward your ports you gotta forward them to the virtual ip for your other comp or laptop or whatever… and in the no-ip where you put your ip address you put your virtual ip…
i hope this helped… if not then gawd knows why it aint workin lol

Read full topic
